system

Class SpaceImp<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • system.SpaceImp<R>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Space<R>, Serializable, Remote

    public class SpaceImp<R>
extends UnicastRemoteObject
implements Space<R>
    Implementation of a Space. Assigns UIDs to tasks and handles comunication with ComputeNodes.
    Author:
    Michael Nekrasov, Roman Kazarin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
